pkgmetadata.longdescription: # File ManagersA Python Package to manage your files and folders easily in different ways[![Release](https://github.com/MusfiqDehan/file-managers/actions/workflows/release.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/MusfiqDehan/file-managers/actions/workflows/release.yml)[![Update Changelog](https://github.com/MusfiqDehan/file-managers/actions/workflows/changelog.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/MusfiqDehan/file-managers/actions/workflows/changelog.yml)## Quick Install```pip3 install file-managers```
